snippet: The Orioles’ ballpark in Baltimore, built in 1992, has undergone a modest face lift, turning an unused area in center field into a roof deck and adding murals and bronze statues.
abstract: Baltimore Oriole's Camden Yards ballpark, built in 1992, has undergone a modest face lift, turning an unused area in center field into a roof deck and adding murals and bronze statues.
lead_paragraph: The Orioles’ ballpark in Baltimore, built in 1992, has undergone a modest face lift, turning an unused area in center field into a roof deck and adding murals and bronze statues.

headline.seo: Oriole Park at Camden Yards Keeps Up With the Times at Age 20
headline.main: At 20, Camden Yards Tries to Keep Up
headline.print_headline: Orioles Keeping First Park of Its Kind Current
